item.title: A helpful little Snowman
item.description: Snowman is a CLI application that I’ve been working on to make my life a little easier. https://github.com/PatOConnor43/snowman So What’s Snowman? During my day job, I work with a lot with APIs. Sometimes I’m writing and testing them, sometimes I’m using them to give feedback to other developers. The problem I had though was managing all those variables! I have at least one set of credentials for each environment I work in and I might even have multiple sets with different scopes in order to test different things.
